statements: SELECT race_title, participant_name, race_result FROM BicycleRaces;
SELECT * FROM BicycleRaces WHERE race_location = 'New York';
SELECT race_title, event_date, race_location FROM BicycleRaces WHERE participant_id = 101;
SELECT participant_name, race_result FROM BicycleRaces WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT race_title, event_date, race_result FROM BicycleRaces ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BicycleRaces ORDER BY event_date DESC, race_title ASC
SELECT race_title, race_location, participant_name FROM BicycleRaces WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT participant_name FROM BicycleRaces WHERE race_location = 'Paris'
SELECT race_title, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM BicycleRaces GROUP BY race_title HAVING total_participants > 10
SELECT MAX(event_date) AS latest_race_date, MIN(event_date) AS earliest_race_date FROM BicycleRaces
SELECT * FROM participant_details;
SELECT participant_name, participant_country FROM participant_details ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT race_name, race_date FROM race_results WHERE race_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participant_details WHERE participant_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT race_name, participant_name FROM race_results INNER JOIN participant_details ON race_results.winner_id = participant_details.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM participant_details WHERE participant_country = 'USA' ORDER BY participant_age ASC
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participant_details WHERE participant_age > 30 AND participant_country = 'Canada'

SELECT race_name, race_date, p.participant_name AS winner_name FROM race_results r INNER JOIN participant_details p ON r.winner_id = p.participant_id WHERE race_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY race_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM participant_details
SELECT p.participant_name AS winner, r.race_name, r.race_date FROM race_results r INNER JOIN participant_details p ON r.winner_id = p.participant_id WHERE r.race_date < '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM participant_details
SELECT participant_name, participant_country FROM participant_details ORDER BY participant_age DESC
SELECT race_name, winner_id FROM race_results WHERE race_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_dates WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT participant_name, participant_country, participant_age FROM participant_details WHERE participant_country = 'USA'
SELECT * FROM participant_details ORDER BY participant_age DESC, participant_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, participant_country FROM participant_details WHERE participant_country='USA';
SELECT race_name, race_date, winner_id, participant_name FROM race_results JOIN participant_details ON race_results.winner_id = participant_details.participant_id ORDER BY race_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_dates WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM participant_details JOIN race_results ON participant_details.participant_id = race_results.winner_id WHERE participant_age > 25 ORDER BY participant_age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM Participants ORDER BY participant_age DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_gender FROM Participants WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM Participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Female' ORDER BY participant_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM Results WHERE result_position <= 3 ORDER BY result_position ASC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM Participants WHERE participant_gender = 'Male';
SELECT race_name, race_date, race_location FROM Races WHERE race_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Results WHERE result_time BETWEEN '10:00:00' AND '12:00:00';

SELECT participant_name, event_name, result_position FROM Participants JOIN Results ON Participants.participant_id = Results.participant_id JOIN Races ON Results.race_id = Races.race_id JOIN Events ON Races.race_id = Events.event_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM Participants;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT full_name, age, city FROM Participants;
SELECT race_name, race_date, race_location FROM Races WHERE race_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_id, finish_time, position FROM Results WHERE race_id = 3 ORDER BY finish_time;
SELECT * FROM Participants ORDER BY age DESC, full_name ASC;
SELECT race_name, race_date, race_location FROM Races WHERE race_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT full_name, city FROM Participants WHERE gender = 'M' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;

SELECT Participants.full_name, Races.race_name, Results.position FROM Participants INNER JOIN Results ON Participants.participant_id = Results.participant_id INNER JOIN Races ON Results.race_id = Races.race_id WHERE position = 1;
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC
